content: page 1 of 8 the northern hemisphere sky by arina shofiya level intermediate this pattern is for personal use only copying distribution or publication is not allowed ©arina2024 page 2 of 8 finished measurements approximately 22 x 49 5 materials   approximately 656 yds / 600 m of lace weight yarn sample yarn viscose 656 yds / 600 m per 3 5 oz / 100 g skein  us 2 5 /3 00 mm - 16 / 40 cm circular needle or longer to accomodate large number of stitches suggestion change the needle size gradually from us 2 5 /3 00 mm to us 5 /3 75 mm as used in the sample row 1 52 us 2 5 /3 00 mm row 53 78 us 3 /3 25 mm row 79 114 us 4 /3 50 mm row 115 158 us 5 /3 75 mm  4 mm crochet hook for provisional cast on & chain bind off  notions stitch markers & tapestry needle gauge gauge is not critical on this project but will affect the final dimensions and the amount of yarn used abbreviations cdd center double decrease slip two stitches knitwise knit one pass slipped stitches over chain chain k knit k2tog knit together k3tog knit three stitches together sctog single_crochet together ssk slip slip knit sssk slip slip slip knit st/sts stitch/stitches yo yarn over reference video provisional cast on using a crochet hook https //youtu be/0wkqrg4tmv4 cdd center double decrease https //youtu be/jjun_htwbce crochet chain bind off https //youtu be/lbn8pcuhyca sssk https //youtu be/cg1ykku04is please read the instructions thoroughly before starting the project this pattern is for personal use only copying distribution or publication is not allowed ©arina2024 page 3 of 8 instructions follow the pattern sequence outlined below  garter tab cast on  set up row  chart 1  chart 2  chart 3  chart 4  chart 5  bind off garter tab cast on 1 with scrap yarn use the crochet provisional cast-on method to cast on 3 stitches 2 using the working yarn knit 11 row in garter stitch to create 5 garter ridges do not cut the yarn 3 rotate your work clockwise and pick up 5 stitches along the garter ridge 4 rotate your work clockwise again remove the scrap yarn and knit 3 stitches from the cast-on edge you now have 11 sts on the needles 3 garter edge sts + 5 pattern sts + 3 garter edge sts set up row knit one row as follows wrong side k3 p5 k3 11 sts continue to chart 1 page 4 chart notes charts are read from right to left and bottom to top only odd-numbered row are charted pay attention to colored sections for special instructions consider placing stitch markers between chart repetitions moving them each row that starts with a yellow stitch even row  row instructions k3 purl to last 3 stitches k3 this pattern is for personal use only copying
